name: Close Fit
description:
Edit: Nevermind dont play it its very broken XD 

Edit 2: I    fixed most of the bugs

Edit 3: Nevermind it seems like its still broken, the UI will start flashing and the  click events will continuously click. It didnt behave like this before my second update...

Edit 4:  Fixed a few things, hopefully its more playable now

Heya! 

This is a puzle game, the theme is Shapes.

Dispite the lack of sounds I hope you enjoy and give me feedback!

Please read the Postmortem.pdf included for more information.

There are credits for the  help I  got during this process in the info seccion of the game.
